_header: The hart the hare the wolf and the wild boar
_description: List of the Beasts of venery — one couplet

BLEge1995.Transcription:
The herteThe hareThe wolfeAnd the wylde BoreOf venery
                    there bynne nomor
BLEge1995.Note:
With heading, ‘For a yong gentylle man to knowe the termys of
                    venery and the crafte whyche the iiii bestys of venery’ (f. 63); followed
                    by further lists of ‘bestys of the Chasse’, etc. First verse line is
                    divided into four manuscript lines.
BLEge1995.Attributed Title:
For a yong gentylle man to knowe the termys of venery and the crafte whyche
                    the iiii bestys of venery (f. 63)
